A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was better than the Force Awakens...but in my opinion that's a low bar. Also I don't understand what people are saying that it's SJW. It's not that SJW at all. My biggest problem with the new Star Wars movies is that they're boring and predictable and they try too hard to deliver fan service. It was a bit too long and some parts were anti-climatic. The whole casino planet arc could've been cut out. The fight scenes were mediocre at best. And I hate what they did to Luke's character. In conclusion it's a mediocre film.
